name: currentOwner
description: The address in a bech32 format of the current owner of the token.

name: data

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: The attributes of the token.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: The creator of the token (address).

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Arbitrary field that should contain the hash of the NFT metadata.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Token metadata.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Token name.

fields.name: nonEmptyURIs
fields.description: Whether the token has non empty uris.

fields.name: royalties
fields.description: NFT royalties. Numeric value between 0 and 10000 (0 meaning 0% and 10000 meaning 100%).

fields.name: uris
fields.description: A list of URIs.

fields.name: whiteListedStorage
fields.description: Whether the token has whitelisted storage. An NFT/SFT has whitelisted storage if the URI belongs to one of the allowed decentralized storage services, such as IPFS or Pinata.

description: A structure that contains additional information about a token.

name: name
description: The name of the token. It contains alphanumeric characters only.

name: nonce
description: The sequence number of the token. This field is empty in the case of `FungibleESDT`.

name: ownersHistory

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address of (historical) owner.

description: A list of all the owners of a token.

name: roles

fields.name: ESDTRoleLocalBurn
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleLocalMint
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTAddQuantity
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTAddURI
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTBurn
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTCreate
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTUpdateAttributes
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTTransferRole
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTCreateMultiShard
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleLocalNFTCreate
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleBurnForAll
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTUpdate
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleNFTRecreate
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleModifyRoyalties
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleSetNewURI
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

fields.name: ESDTRoleModifyCreator
fields.description: List of addresses with the role in question (see name of column).

description: A structure with information about the addresses that have certain roles for the token.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the token was created.

name: token
description: The token field is composed of the `ticker` field and a random sequence generated when the token is created(e.g. `ABCD-012345`).

name: type
description: The type of the token. It can be `FungibleESDT`, `NonFungibleESDT`, `SemiFungibleESDT`, or `MetaESDT`.

name: changedToDynamicTimestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the token has been changed to dynamic.
